sentences.english: Summons greatly, is the first Lamaism which Huhhot constructs summons the temple.
sentences.chinese: 大召，是呼和浩特建造的第一座喇嘛教召庙。

sentences.english: Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region is briefly named as Inner Mongolia with Hohhot as its capital city.
sentences.chinese: 内蒙古自治区简称内蒙古，省会城市是呼和浩特。

sentences.english: From the east to subcontract Hohhot baotou to 50 km south expressway.
sentences.chinese: 从呼和浩特到包头转包东高速向南50公里。

sentences.english: Huhhot is the capital of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 呼和浩特是内蒙古自治区的首府。
